name: Princess Girls 2: Craft House
description:
Move into a new exciting journey with pretty princesses! The adventures with Elsa and her friends continue, explore with Rapunzel, Jasmine and Ariel different corners of the wonderful Kingdom, communicate with the characters, build your Castle in an amazing fairy-tale world of fantasy and magic.

Completely free game for children and adults, open and create your world from various beautiful blocks and interior items (flowers, paintings, kitchen, bedroom, computer table, sofa and much more), fulfill your creative ideas.
Special mode with the kingdom for the wonderful princesses, where you can choose for yourself one of the houses or build your own cozy castle.

- The game gives you full access to the creative mode for the construction of any creative buildings.
- Explore caves and mines, extract treasures and make new friends.
- New game mode Kingdom with a unique map of the Middle Ages.
- Build your own kingdom or fortress for the princesses.
- A variety of game characters that live in a fairy-tale world.
- Many new beautiful blocks and pieces of furniture.
- And much more!!!
